label: 刃文
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 56th  . Nara National Museum . 2004
説明文: Temper patterns on swords, these textural designs come about during the forging process. The chemical effects of tempering in the area between the blade and the ridge are divided into straight sword patterns and convoluted sword patterns; mist-like reflective spots are called nie.
